channel.title: MSN Hacked
channel.description:
My MSN has been hacked, so anyone that knows me. It isn't me on it... I don't really know who or how they did it. But if I ever met them I'd fucking kill them.
Feel free to post if your MSN has ever been hacked, and if you found out how they did it.

item.title: MSN Hacked
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I think mine’s been hacked. Every time I re-login, there are at least 3 people that are blocked, and I have new friends that I don’t even know.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

I Vain I:

Someone froze my MSN before, if that counts…

Vain has my MSN been on to day? If it has, it isn’t me.

Read full topic

item.title: MSN Hacked
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

I Vain I:

Someone froze my MSN before, if that counts…

You can easily fix that >.>
But yea, never been hacked. I have been frozen before though.

item.title: MSN Hacked
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Kind of disturbing that you would kill someone because of that. And I did have my MSN account hacked before, it was an account I use to use about four years ago. Someone placed a key logger on me, and it would continued to be hacked all the time when I woke up, but he never changed the security question I had on it, so I would get it back all the time.

Read full topic
